### CSScomb JS css. ### CTags CTags. ### DocBlockr DocBlock Javascript, PHP, ActionScript, CoffeeScript, Java, Objective C, C C++ : ```js /** * [foobar description] * @param {[type]} baz [description] * @param {[type]} quux [description] * @return {[type]} */ function foobar (baz, quux) { } ``` /** tab enter. ### Emmet zencoding. . - cmd + ` - ctrl + up/down / 1 - alt + up/down / 0.1 - cmd + alt + up/down / 10 - cmd + shift + / - cmd + shift + . - cmd + shift + , - shift + ctrl + d encode / decode data uri - ctrl + j html <> - ctrl + d html <> - shift + ctrl + i - ctrl + alt + left/right / ### FileDiffs . ### GitGutter .
### Gutter Color css .
### ImageMagick .
### JSON Reindent JSON. ### SideBarEnhancements : - . - a link script. - .. : [https://github.com/titoBouzout/SideBarEnhancements](https://github.com/titoBouzout/SideBarEnhancements) ### SublimeLinter . #### : **SublimeLinter-annotations** TODO, FIXME . **SublimeLinter-contrib-scss-lint** Sass. **SublimeLinter-csslint** css csslint. **SublimeLinter-jshint** javascript jshint. ### Tag html . readme [.](https://github.com/SublimeText/Tag) ### Terminal - cmd + shift + t ### TernJS + JavaScript. ### HTML5, JavaScript & NodeJS Snippets, jQuery, LESS, SCSS, NodeJS, Stylus, Twig

Post.title: ProjectsList -   Sublime Text 3
Post._content:
>   Sublime Text 3 - ProjectsList ([github](https://github.com/d4rkr00t/ProjectsList))

     Sublime Text 2  Nettuts     ,                   ,      ,   .

     :  sublime           /     ,        sublime:

-      (cmd+P/ctrl+P)
-     css/html  .. ( AutoFileName)
-    ( AdvancedNewFile)

     ,           Sublime Text 3.  ,  ,   :

##   ProjectsList

-      
-    
-       
-     

## 

        Packages.

```
git clone https://github.com/d4rkr00t/ProjectsList.git ProjectsList
```

      Package Control

## 

   ,  cmd+shift+p (ctrl+shift+p)  Manage Projects    .     :
```json
{
     "projects_windows": [
         {
            "name":"Project Name",
            "paths": ["folder append", "second folder append", ...],
            "open_on_start": ["file opened on start", "second file append on start", ...]
         },
         {
            "name":"Project Name 2",
            "paths": ["folder append", "second folder append", ...],
            "open_on_start": ["file opened on start", "second file append on start", ...]
         }
    ],
     "projects_linux": [
         {
            "name":"Project Name",
            "paths": ["folder append", "second folder append", ...],
            "open_on_start": ["file opened on start", "second file append on start", ...]
         }
     ],
     "projects_osx": [
         {
            "name":"Project Name",
            "paths": ["folder append", "second folder append", ...],
            "open_on_start": ["file opened on start", "second file append on start", ...]
         }
     ]
}
```

- name -  
- paths -     
- open_on_start -       

## 

    cmd+shift+p (ctrl+shift+p)   Open Project -     Append Project     .

    ,    Linux     .

>   [github](https://github.com/d4rkr00t/ProjectsList)

Post.title: :       SQL
Post._content:
:    ,      -          , ,  1.

     :

```
    SELECT row_number FROM (
        SELECT *,
        @curRow := @curRow + 1 AS row_number
        FROM    user_raiting
        JOIN(SELECT @curRow := 0) r
        WHERE   type = 1
        ORDER BY raiting DESC
    ) AS c
    WHERE user_id = 4
```

  ,    ,   ()           **@curRow**.         ,        .

  ,       ,        .

Post.title: Dega      JavaScript
Post._content:
> [GitHub](https://github.com/d4rkr00t/Dega)

1.2 kb 620 byte gzip.

Chrome, Safari Firefox. . ## Dega , AMD CommonJS . ### Bower: ``` bower install dega --save ``` ### , npm : ``` npm install dega --save ``` ### Dega, CommonJS : ```js Dega = require('dega'); ``` ## ```js var handler = function(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log('event'); }; // Dega(document).on('click', '.link', handler); // Dega(document).off('click', '.link', handler); ``` ### Dega , __new__ . #### Dega : 1) HTMLElement: ```js Dega(document) ``` 2) , document.querySelector: ```js Dega('.class') Dega('#id') Dega('tag') ``` ## TODO * , * . > - . [GitHub](https://github.com/d4rkr00t/Dega).

Post.title: setup  Atom
Post._content:
##
## , Atom One Light. One Dark, Neutron UI (, atom , deprecated, [](https://github.com/d4rkr00t/neutron-ui) ). ## ```less /* , minimap */ atom-text-editor::shadow .vertical-scrollbar { opacity: 0; width: 0; } /* */ atom-text-editor::shadow { .cursor-line { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .04); } .invisible-character { opacity: 0.4; } } ``` ## ### advanced-new-file , CMD + Alt + N, , . ### atom-beautify : HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, PHP, Ruby, Python, Java, C, C++, C#, Objective-C, CoffeeScript, TypeScript, SQL. ### atom-color-highlight . , , .
### atom-ternjs JavaScript. . ### auto-detect-indention . ### autocomplete-plus autocomplete, . : * autocomplete-path * autocomplete-snippets ### autoprefixer autoprefixer, css , autoprefixer . ### color-picker .
### compare-files diff . ### css-comb [ ](/css-comb-atom/) csscomb atom.
### docblockr DocBlock Javascript, PHP, ActionScript, CoffeeScript, Java, Objective C, C C++ : ``` /** * Generates eventListener item for Dega._eventListeners list * @param {String} type event type like 'click' | 'focus' | 'blur' * @param {String} selector .class | #id | div * @param {Function} callback user passed callback * @param {Boolean} useCapture */ ``` ### Emmet zencoding. . ### file-icons :
### linter , , , , codestyle. , : * linter-csslint * linter-htmllint * linter-jscs * linter-jshint * linter-jsonlint * linter-jsx ( , ) ### minimap sublime text. ### project-manager , . ### remember-session . ### tab-control . ### toggle-quotes . * ctrl + shift + ' ### view-tail-large-files , , 2 . ### * bemhtml * react * stylus * language-dot( .bash_profile .gitconfig ) * language-ejs * language-html-swig
